page.title: 07Parkhill Hotel-Menu
page.content: This is for{Wednesday 3rd July 1985 {Â£10.75 inc V.A.T.}(service not inc.) {CREME DE TOMATO ET ORANGE}(cream of tomato and orange soup) {TERRINE DE SAUMOM FUME}(smoked salmon and avocado with lettuce) {PAMPLEMOUSSE ET MELON CREME DE MENTHE (grapefruit and melon cocktail with mint) {CAILLE RON AU RUBARBE}(roast quail with a red wine and rhubarb sauce) {ESCALOPE DE PORC BELL DIJONAISE}(pan fried pork escalope with Dijon mustard) {ROGNON D'AGNEAU "ARTIOS"}(lamb kidneys with a white wine sauce served with rice) A choice of a dessert Various cheeses {CAFE A LA CREME ET PETIT FOURS-}Â£1.00 {DECAFEINE ET PETIT FOURS-}Â£1.10
